name: tag
description: The element tag that wraps the entire component. We use label by default to pass all focus to the input element.

name: id
description:
Unique id to use for the input element. This will also bind to the "for" attribute of the label element wrapping the component.

Note! The "TFieldWrapper" will auto generate this if set to null.

name: readonly
description: Sets the input field to be readonly.

name: disabled
description: Sets the input field to be disabled.

name: hint
description: Adds text at the bottom of the component. Usually used to give hint or clue on what the user can enter.

name: error
description:
Indicates error for the component.

Note! This attribute adds a margin at the bottom (mb-5) of the wrapper element to give space for the error message. If set to null, the added margin will be removed.

name: error-message
description: The message displayed when an error occurs.

name: cursor
description: Mouse cursor to use on hover for the component. Supports any class names by tailwind for cursors.

name: onResize
description:
Function called whenever the component size changes.

This uses the "SizeObserver" component to get the component size.

name: inner-class
description: Add class names to the inner wrapper of the component.

name: inner-style
description: Add css styles to the inner wrapper of the component.

name: hint-class
description: Add class names to the hint container. Ignored when using the hint slot.
